As a ...

Acceptance Criteria:

- [ ] User can enter a username and password to log in.

- [ ] User is redirected to their profile page after successful login.

- [ ]

Tasks:

- [ ] Set up login form.

- [ ] Implement authentication logic.

- [ ] Redirect user after login.
